scripts.start:dev: npm run build:mfes && npm run sync:mfes && npm run dev --prefix host
scripts.sync:mfes: rm -rf host/public/sidebar host/public/page1 host/public/page2 && mkdir -p host/public/sidebar host/public/page1 host/public/page2 && cp -R sidebar/dist/* host/public/sidebar/ && cp -R page1/dist/* host/public/page1/ && cp -R page2/dist/* host/public/page2/
scripts.start:mfes: concurrently -n sidebar,page1,page2 -c green,yellow,magenta "cross-env SINGLE_SPA=true npm run dev --prefix sidebar" "cross-env SINGLE_SPA=true npm run dev --prefix page1" "npm run dev --prefix page2"
scripts.build:mfes: npm run build --prefix sidebar && npm run build --prefix page1 && npm run build --prefix page2
